DESCRIPTION: Make a deck of cards to fight the boss
IN_RAID: The command cannot be ran while in raid
UNIQUE_WARN: Note : All the moves have to be unique in deck to duel/raid
MISSING_SILVERS: You do not have enough silvers to unlock the slot
UNLOCK_WARN: Unlock the slot {{deckNo}} to generate deck
MOVES_UNIQUE: All the moves in the set must be unique | Select a different card or different moves for the same card
SAVE_DECK: Click on save to set this deck
EMBED_FOOTER: Note : All the moves have to be unique in deck to duel/raid
UNLOCK_SAVE: Unlock the slot {{deckNo}} to save deck
UNLOCK_GENERATE: Unlock the slot ${deckNo} to generate deck
NOT_ENOUGH_CARD: Not enough cards with different moves. Please collect more cards
UNLOCK_SELECT: Unlock the slot {{deckNo}} to select deck
